Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus (MIC=0.5-1.0 µg/ml), Neurospora crassa (MIC=0.5-1.0 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Transgenic plants: Insect peptide metchnikowin confers on barley a selective capacity for resistance to fungal ascomycetes pathogens (J Exp Bot. 2009;60(14)
